results.description: England-based Macauley Bonne withdraws from the Zimbabwe squad days after getting his passport allowing him to play in Africa Cup of Nations qualifiers.

results.title: Macauley Bonne forced out of Zimbabwe squad on 'medical grounds'

results.description: Watch highlights as Callum McFadzean earns League Two Plymouth a place in the FA Cup second round with a 1-0 win over League One hosts Bolton Wanderers.
results.title: Bolton Wanderers 0-1 Plymouth Argyle highlights

results.title: Bolton Wanderers 0-1 Plymouth Argyle

results.title: Listen: Commentaries from 20 FA Cup first-round ties

results.description: Bolton and Fleetwood will investigate after a number of Town fans complained about stewarding in the away section.
results.title: Bolton Wanderers & Fleetwood Town investigating complaints over stewarding

results.description: From Bolton's 'purple patch' to Gareth Ainsworth's potential chart-topper, it was another weird and wonderful Saturday in the EFL.
results.shortTitle: Five things you may have missed in the EFL

results.description: Strikers Chris O'Grady and Daryl Murphy score first-half goals as bottom side Bolton beat League One high-flyers Fleetwood.
results.title: Bolton Wanderers 2-1 Fleetwood Town

results.description: Saturday's League One game between Lincoln City and Bolton Wanderers is postponed because of a waterlogged pitch.
results.title: Lincoln City P-P Bolton Wanderers

results.description: The former Premier League player faces a "terrible prognosis" after being diagnosed with MND.
results.title: Ex-Liverpool player Stephen Darby's fight with 'brutal disease'

results.description: Bolton boss Keith Hill credits his players' efforts in adversity after their first league win of the season at Bristol Rovers.
results.shortTitle: Bolton get 'deserved' first win of season
results.title: Bristol Rovers 0-2 Bolton Wanderers: Keith Hill's Trotters earn first win of season

results.description: Goals from Callum Camps, Oliver Rathbone and Fabio Tavares deny Keith Hill a first win as Bolton manager as his former club Rochdale come from behind to win.
results.title: Bolton Wanderers 1-3 Rochdale

results.description: Keith Hill is still waiting for his first win as Bolton boss after a goalless draw against Blackpool in League One.
results.title: Bolton Wanderers 0-0 Blackpool

results.description: Bolton Wanderers sign striker Joseph Dodoo on a deal until the end of the season after his contract expired at Rangers.
results.title: Joseph Dodoo: Bolton Wanderers sign striker until the end of the season

results.description: Brett Pitman goes from villain to hero to earn Portsmouth a hard-fought win at home to Bolton and ease the pressure on manager Kenny Jackett.
results.title: Portsmouth 1-0 Bolton Wanderers

results.description: Aiden McGeady's injury-time penalty earns Sunderland a draw against League One bottom side Bolton.
results.title: Bolton Wanderers 1-1 Sunderland

results.description: Keith Hill earns his first point as Bolton manager after a League One draw with Oxford at the University of Bolton Stadium.
results.title: Bolton Wanderers 0-0 Oxford United

results.description: Rotherham storm back from behind to smash Bolton 6-1 in Keith Hill's first game in charge of Wanderers.
results.title: Rotherham United 6-1 Bolton Wanderers

results.description: Bolton shipping another hatful of goals and Southend United finally getting off the mark are among the things you may have missed in the EFL.
results.shortTitle: Bolton 'will be great again' and Sampson's tough week
results.title: EFL: Bolton 'will be great', Sampson's tough week, boost for Scunthorpe and Southend

results.description: Struggling League One side Bolton Wanderers sign former Bradford City defender Adam Chicksen. on a deal until January.
results.title: Adam Chicksen: Bolton Wanderers sign former Bradford defender as a free agent
